name: AI Revengence
description:
This is a game you can play using only 2d6 and 1d4 dice. Download the Excel, follow the instructions, and enjoy a guided Dice RPG with a few choices to make. 

Feel free to tweak the rules and experiment but please do not redistribute. 

You can also run this game as a "Dungeon Master" type role, for a friend, not showing them the results of the potential outcomes before hand and adding +/- 1 tweaks to the rewards for different types of gameplay and different narratives. 

Let the story unfold!
